Reviews.Title: “disappointing”
Reviews.Author: Hawkergirl
Reviews.Content: stayed daisy hotel looked lovely trip advisor reviews hotel budget option medium priced quaint quarter sea views attractive tiny pension public bedrooms tiny damp attractive tired decor peeling walls useless television couldnt tuned sanitary ware leaked everthing tiny bathroom breakfast little short joke prepared entrance lobby lobby barely size storm porch musty lucky bit sea view roof terrace deplorable repair soggy broken furniture perch plus aziz charming location perfect site seeing hotel loved stay daisy priced pension budget budget accomodation ps waste money taxis istanbul public transport excellent reliable easy navigate fun cheap chips

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointing!”
Reviews.Author: newbie1982
Reviews.Content: booked trip istanbul daisy hotel 6 months travelling october 2011 wed read reviews site concerned people arriving told booking emailed weeks advance ensured ok booking arrival hotel disappointed size city view onto street shower didnt enclosure cold limited bedding couple days stay informed moving hotel werent keen daisy hotel upset spend time packing moving unpacking belongings move hotel especially wed assured prior travelling booking confirmed move positive nicer hotel caused disruption holiday due pack return hotel half day move unpack people criticised breakfast found adequate similar offer hotels cafes bit basic possibly

Reviews.Title: “RUNAWAY!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ioustinim
Reviews.Content: booked sea view 2 months planned trip istanbul frankly main reason chose stay sea view arrived owner aziz told didnâ€™t booked confirm 5 days prior arrival facing road sea view balcony window lacked shower cabinet simple curtain time floor flooded water smelled badly left windows morning towel person soap toilet paper time breakfast table couldnâ€™t stop laughing picture carry terrace stairs dishes washed dishes wc complained aziz telling reduce amount pay told couldnâ€™t due inconvenience provide free airport transfer course day leaving shuttle bus aziz answer phone 45 min waiting taxi otherwise missed flight reported booking site able write review probably time contacted site didnâ€™t surprised worst experience hotel

Reviews.Title: “Despite our reservation, they had no rooms and sent us to another hotel”
Reviews.Author: afreund83
Reviews.Content: reservation male friends nights april 2011 triple 75 euro night hotel located sultanhamet 510 minute walk blue mosque reservation online weeks confirmed directly hotel arrived owner informed limited couldnt communicate stay partner hotel similar quality partner hotel 10 minutes walking water closer blue mosque partner hotel decently nice bearing review appreciate relocated efficiently quickly annoyed didnt reserved mention complication via email arrived people met weekend exact partner hotel isolated twoday incident cant walk daisy hotel breakfast morning buffet breakfast poor compared trip selection bread jam ate terrace top floor decently nice view river pros location terrace cons sent partner hotel worse town poor breakfast staff limited english
